price: 39.abbobtiy katayak Sugeeni ken katayak suge marak ittah: tokkel nee kee sin digaalal massownah isin Addunyal meqe taamah nek edde muxxutteenim mantuunuk Jahannam girah digaalá tammoysa uma taamoomi abak sugteenimih sabbatah.
arabic: وَقَالَتۡ أُولَىٰهُمۡ لِأُخۡرَىٰهُمۡ فَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا مِن فَضۡلٖ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālat ūlāhum li-ukh'rāhum famā kāna lakum ʿalaynā min faḍlin fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum taksibūna
